mapper.select: SELECT node.*, (COUNT(parent.id) - 1) AS depth FROM resource node INNER JOIN resource AS parent LEFT JOIN role_resource rr ON rr.resource_id = node.id LEFT JOIN role r2 ON rr.role_id = r2.id LEFT JOIN role_staff rs ON rs.role_id = r2.id LEFT JOIN staff s ON rs.staff_id = s.id WHERE s.username = #{username} AND node.lft BETWEEN parent.lft AND parent.rgt GROUP BY node.id ORDER BY node.lft
